review: Excellent and very experienced doctor. Patient and explained the treatment choice well. Definitely recommend.

I dont have to write a review for this brilliant doctor but anyway, I will try to put in a few words..

He is one of the best spine doctors we have in Karnataka.  You need to sit and talk to him to understand how effectively he can help you. All the past history should be given to him accurately for proper diagnosis. He understand the severity of the issue and helps you guide from there.

One sincere request to the public, please do not curse the doctor if he is late or he is stuck in an emergency. Please be patient. 

Doctors are equal to god. dont criticize them without knowing the facts. 


Thanks.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: One of the great doctor, ever I met. I went to him with father in law 5 yrs ago and looking to write feedback for him so that it can help others and pay little gratitude to great man.The things that impressed me...1. He pays time more to understand the problem than writing the prescription.2. To focused treatments, good explanation of problem and why he is giving the particular treatments.Many doctors give too many medicines to my father in law for a simple fracture not getting settled. But He just cured with 150 rs stretch.the way he explained it seemed very trivial problem and simple solution required.

I had an appointment with Dr Shetty on 18/04/2015 which i had booked before two weeks. It was clearly informed that i m coming from North-East and my problem has been escalating day by day. But i was flabbergasted on knowing that Dr. Shetty is out of station on the same day around 4 hrs before my appointment time. We had no prior information about non-availability of doctor either telephonically or message. Being such a reputed clinic, this is very unprofessional and carelessness. I am deeply hurt by such response.
Hope you will take this matter seriously and find out the reason for such negligence.   

Regards,
Sangita Bhowmik
Patient name-Mr Ratan Sarkar
Doctor was thorough in his examination. Diagnosis was spot on.  He recommended physiotherapy and no extra medication. All in all, a very good experience.

Visited Dr. Subodh for my mother's hand fracture. It was an emergecy however, doctor explained the issue very calmly. Suggested to unergo surgery which he lead very smoothly. He was absolutely attentive to patient's wellbeing. We were also impressed with the suport we received from his staff at his clinic, Ishaan orthopedic center.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor is not only friendly but has the patient to listen to the concern of patients.
His diagnosis is also very precise. This is our second experience with Dr.
My sister too was treated with precision and she is very fine now and relieved of pain and ailment.
Thank you Dr. Be blessed.

I have been visited multiple orthopidic doctors as my problem require surgency , to undergo operation we need confidence and that will happen the way doctor explains what is happen and what needs to be done and how it can carry further , Dr Subodh Shetty was explained such way I was suffering this from 2 years and worried to get operated . But now I will get it operated without any further postponing which will make problems 

Patient : my friend Sridhi 
Written : Pramod

Happy with the consultation I had with this doctor. The first appointment was in Apollo Spectra Hospital, Koramangala in evening and was disappointing in the sense we had to wait for more than an hour to see him. The followup was in his clinic in Koramangala which was very quick as there was just one patient before me and the appointment was in the morning. His PA/secretary is helpful in guiding the patients with appointments and directions of the consultation location.

Everything is organized very well at clinic,Doctor understands your problems and suggest you good consultation for the same. Physiotherapist is also give good pain relief exercises.
I will definitely recommend people this clinic for bones,injury and physio related problems.

We had to wait more than 30 min. Once I cancelled the appointment after waiting for 30 min as was getting late for office. We heard same from other patients as well that doctor is in his house which is upstairs n just making us wait to feel important.  I will not recommend him to anyone if he don't respect patients time.

The doctor is here to earn money. Does not know his field. Gave unnecessary medicines like painkillers and gas problems, which was not the problem. On top of that he wants to sell his own medicines and not give prescriptions of outside medicines despite patient asking for it

Fully recommend the doctor. I've been treated timely and respectfully both the times I've been here. One for muscle injury and the second for a joint injury.
The doctor is very polite and explains issues in as much detail as required

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Doctor is empathetic and listens to understand. He was able to diagnose and provide the treatment and precautions to be taken.

I visited to Doctor Subodh Shetty along with my mom, she had been shifted from my native to Bangalore and had a long medical history, in past She had complains about back ache and could on sit for more than 2 hrs at a stretch, One of the orthopedic doctor at my native has advised for HIP replacement, which was a bell ringer, 
I had not written any feedback just after the first visit, as I wanted to see the effect of medication, Regarding first consultation, It Consultation was good, dr. has patiently listen the problems, has suggested some x-rays  which was available in the clinic and was fast, he came up with the diagnosis, It was ok, He had detected beginning of bone degeneration which can be cured by medication. After one month of medication my mom says her pain is better she can sit more time and the pain in bone has definitely gone down without any pain killers, which has made me to give this feedback, I will definitely suggest Dr. Shetty for consultation.
It wad very good. After consulting with the doctor i feel very much comfortable. Doctor was very friendly.

I was in critical condition of my knee join pain, after treatment as per the doctor advice I got completely relief all my pain within five days . Now am everything alright. Am so satisfied.
I recommended  Dr.Subodh M Shetty for those who has problem of Bones and join pain or any related issue.

Visiting this doctor second time.. he is just awesome..his expertise and knowledge about his job is clearly visible in the way he speaks.. would recommended Dr. Subodh or SMS bone clinic for orthopedic issues any day..
I don't know about diagnoses, but medicines which prescribed no where available except in his medical shop. Prescription writing is horrible, difficult to under
Actually I searched on Practo to find the best doctor for my needs and found him top rated. Well deserving doctor. Good judgment. Got relief of neck pain within a day

No power for X Ray machine operations. Had to wait for 45 minutes to get the X Ray done. 
Should keep alternative power arrangements as time is precious for all of us !

The doctor did not even hear me out properly. 
A good doctor should have the patience to listen to the patient and then explain the problem and treatment.

He overcharged me. Though X-ray was not required but he asked for it.
Charged me 1280 for telling me nothing is wrong, just simple couple of days physio will take care of things.
